translations: （法）开胃小菜；夹鱼子或小鱼的烤面包

sentences.sentence: Remark on details from the event - "These canapes are delicious!"
sentences.translation: 评论一下这次活动的细节——“这些鱼子酱面包味真美味！”

sentences.sentence: Add on package provided excellent breakfast, evening drinks & canapes, internet and late check out which really helps for night flights.
sentences.translation: 而且套餐包含了很棒的早餐、晚间饮料和小吃、网络和晚退房，对于像我这样赶夜班飞机的人来说真的很好。
